data.persona: I am the village priest. I cure people. I bring the light.
data.description:
You are in the outside of the temple offices.
Outside the office is a beautiful garden filled with white flowers surrounding the entire building. There is a yellow brick road leading to the church. The surrounding trees and plants are beautifully trimmed and gives the area a peaceful atmosphere. Many doves and other birds love hanging around here enjoying its serene environment.
The clergyman is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I want to welcome the clergyman to the temple
data.mid_motivation: I want the clergyman to join me for the service later today
data.long_motivation: I want the clergyman to stay at the temple for some weeks
